definition: to prevail/to achieve victory/to be victorious
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: Had Jesus not died on the cross, Christianity would not have triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌要是不死在十字架上，基督教就無法取得勝利。

sentences.english: Once Mao had achieved victory and eliminated his enemies, what was there left for him to do?
sentences.chinese: 當毛取得勝利消滅敵人後，他應該做什麼？

sentences.english: Victory in Libya comes first in time and importance.
sentences.chinese: 在利比亞取得勝利，在時間和重要性上應排在第一。

sentences.english: Keep up the struggle till you succeed.
sentences.chinese: 繼續戰鬥直到你們取得勝利。

sentences.english: He is with what he needs to win at life.
sentences.chinese: 他的一生中，有取得勝利所需要的能力。

sentences.english: The following year saw Cossack victory at Batoh.
sentences.chinese: 第二年，哥薩克在巴託格取得勝利。

sentences.english: Cafu hopes that this will motivate the team to win the game following the draw against Ascoli in the first matchday.
sentences.chinese: 卡福希望第一場比賽的平局將激發球隊取得勝利。

sentences.english: The Reds got back to winning ways with second-half strikes from Gerrard and Yossi Benayoun.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦下半場由傑拉德和貝納永的進球取得勝利。

sentences.english: China used tough defense to contain their opponents and win the game.
sentences.chinese: 中國女籃以嚴密的防守來抑制對手，並取得勝利。

sentences.english: To get the kind of success that you want, you need to dream big.
sentences.chinese: 要想取得勝利，你必需有一個弘遠的目的。

sentences.english: The Land Reform is widely conducted in the time of war and achieves success at last.
sentences.chinese: 土改在戰爭環境中得到普遍開展，並最終取得勝利。

sentences.english: We just have to make sure we win at Goodison in a couple of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 二週後，我們仍然有信心在古迪遜公園取得勝利。

sentences.english: They diplomatized in order to win victory.
sentences.chinese: 他們施展手腕，旨在取得勝利。

sentences.english: So for us to come out with this win, it's just really unexplainable .
sentences.chinese: 所以我們最終還能取得勝利，這真的無法解釋。

sentences.english: The soldiers exulted at their victory.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們爲取得勝利而歡躍。

sentences.english: M: We must win the negotiation with the foreign businessman.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在這場與外商的談判中取得勝利。
